name: ERC1155Handler
description: Handles ERC1155 deposits and deposit executions. This contract is intended to be used with the Bridge contract.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: A deposit is initiatied by making a deposit in the Bridge contract.Data passed into the function should be constructed as follows: tokenID uint256 bytes 0 - 32 amount uint256 bytes 32 - 64 destinationRecipientAddress length uint256 bytes 64 - 96 extraData length uint256 bytes 96 - 128 destinationRecipientAddress bytes bytes 128 - x where x = (128 + len(destinationRecipientAddress)) extraData bytes bytes x - (x + len(extraData)). Depending if the corresponding {tokenAddress} for the parsed {resourceID} is marked true in {_burnList}, deposited tokens will be burned, if not, they will be locked.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationChainID
parameterDecorators.description: Chain ID of chain token is expected to be bridged to.

parameterDecorators.name: depositNonce
parameterDecorators.description: This value is generated as an ID by the Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: depositer
parameterDecorators.description: Address of account making the deposit in the Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Consists of: {resourceID}, {tokenID}, {lenDestinationRecipientAddress}, and {destinationRecipientAddress} all padded to 32 bytes.

functionDecorators.name: executeProposal
functionDecorators.description: Proposal execution should be initiated when a proposal is finalized in the Bridge contract. by a relayer on the deposit's destination chain.Data passed into the function should be constructed as follows: tokenID uint256 bytes 0 - 32 amount uint256 bytes 32 - 64 destinationRecipientAddress length uint256 bytes 64 - 96 extraData length uint256 bytes 96 - 128 destinationRecipientAddress bytes bytes 128 - x where x = (128 + len(destinationRecipientAddress)) extraData bytes bytes x - y where y = (x + len(extraData)) metaData length uint256 bytes y - z where z = y + 32 metaData bytes bytes z - a where a = (z + len(metaData)).

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Consists of {tokenID}, {resourceID}, {lenDestinationRecipientAddress}, {lenExtraData} {destinationRecipientAddress}, and {extraData} all padded to 32 bytes.

functionDecorators.name: fundERC1155
functionDecorators.description: Used to transfer tokens into the safe to fund proposals.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of a specific tokenID to send.

parameterDecorators.name: extraData
parameterDecorators.description: The required data param on transfers (not used by all 1155's).

parameterDecorators.name: depositNonce
parameterDecorators.description: This ID will have been generated by the Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: destId
parameterDecorators.description: ID of chain deposit will be bridged to.

returnDecorators.description: DepositRecord which consists of: - _tokenAddress Address used when {deposit} was executed. - _destinationChainID ChainID deposited tokens are intended to end up on. - _resourceID ResourceID used when {deposit} was executed. - _destinationRecipientAddress Address tokens are intended to be deposited to on desitnation chain. - _depositer Address that initially called {deposit} in the Bridge contract. - _tokenID ID of ERC1155. - _amount Amount of tokenID to transfer. - _extraData Optional data field supported by ERC1155.

functionDecorators.name: setBurnable
functionDecorators.description: First verifies {contractAddress} is whitelisted, then sets {_burnList}[{contractAddress}] to true.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of contract to be used when making or executing deposits.

functionDecorators.name: setResource
functionDecorators.description: First verifies {_resourceIDToContractAddress}[{resourceID}] and {_contractAddressToResourceID}[{contractAddress}] are not already set, then sets {_resourceIDToContractAddress} with {contractAddress}, {_contractAddressToResourceID} with {resourceID}, and {_contractWhitelist} to true for {contractAddress}.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID to be used when making deposits.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of contract to be called when a deposit is made and a deposited is executed.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Used to manually release ERC1155 tokens from ERC1155Safe.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of token contract to release.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: The ERC1155 token ID to release. Amount is fixed to 1.
